website_summaries.verdict: The sleek design and overall quality of this bedside sleeper bassinet make it stand out. It comes with anchor straps to use it as a bedside co-sleeper if you choose.
pros: Glider function helps soothe fussy babies
Simple tool-free assembly and 6-level height adjustment
Quickly converts between bassinet and bedside sleeper modes

customer_reviews.title: A bit dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 2 stars because it’s not what I expected. The height at it’s highest still doesn’t reach my matress height which is really dissapointing because it makes it imposible to nurse having the baby inside the sleeper. The matress seems quite a bit too hard for me. Also after assembling it following the instructions it moves alot and to finish it has two BIG warning signs on both sides that you can’t remove.
customer_reviews.author: Olga V.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - SUFFOCATION RISK / NOT STURDY
customer_reviews.text: This product has a huge design flaw making it completely unsafe for babies. It is not sturdy at all, very wobbly side to side, and to make matters worse the mattress does not stay level. I put my newborn baby in this and she kept rolling to the side because her very light weight would tip the mattress enough to roll her into the side, risking suffocation. Her face pressed up against a spot that was not breathable mesh. Thank god I was watching her so closely since I felt so uneasy about the quality of the bassinet. Horrible, unsafe product. Please do not buy and risk your child’s life.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed. Wish I could return and buy a safer one.
customer_reviews.text: Was really excited about the bedside sleeper but it turned out to be a big disappointment. The legs were never even, so it slanted to one side. You have to tighten the straps constantly, I wish the stays were a little more elongated to ensure they wouldn't slide under the mattress. The entire construction is also very unstable moving and rocking with the slightest touch. Their customer service was not helpful Either, stating they could not have it returned if it was used while I only tried it out for a short period.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia P.

customer_reviews.title: Baby Loves Bedside Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old loves this bedside sleeper! Originally, we used a Finnish box that he didn’t like too much. It was about $450 for a cardboard box with quality clothes in it. Not worth it. It was too small. He was growing by the day literally. We needed something bigger that we can use next to our bed and fit our small bedroom. This bedside sleeper did the trick! Pros: Baby sleeps better (naps and bedtime got easier after this purchase) Can see the baby easily Can access and grab the baby when he gets fussy Breastfeeding is a lot easier Room for growth Mesh sides, more air circulation Easy to put together Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality except for the mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress did not have enough support, too thin. My newborn did not sleep well in here and has slept much better on her crib mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie B.

customer_reviews.title: SIDS Danger
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bassinet! The mattress is not level and our newborn daughter was able to roll onto her side and stomach while sleeping. The one night we had her in this I woke up to find her on her side with her face pressed into the cloth siding. We properly assembled the bassinet so the uneven mattress is not due to an assembly error.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying!
customer_reviews.text: Better then I expected!!! Two pieces to snap together, so easy to assemble! It’s way bigger then I expected and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal bryant

customer_reviews.title: Too short for any bed anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I have a normal height bed. A mattress on a box spring. This would not even be tall enough for the box spring. Make sure you measure before buying. We sent ours back. You can't use the function you are probably buying it for unless it is flush with your bed. I would have had to get out of bed to put baby in and take him out of this and to do that I would have to move it away from the bed because its going to block you getting in and out of the bed so that defeats the whole purpose of it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy mom

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I have the bassinet put together in anticipation of our newborn's arrival. I haven't actually used it yet so I will update my review after the birth and let you know how I like it. It seems that it will work very well. I can adjust the height so it is at bed level. Also the safety straps go all the way under the mattress and has tabs on the other side to keep it from tipping over. I like the zip down feature, which should make it easy to access the baby without having to get out of bed.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, my son hated it.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It was the perfect height for our bed and I really liked the amount of mesh that it had. Unfortunately, my son absolutely hated this bed, so we are returning it. I also didn't like that it swayed side to side a little too easy for my comfort--and yes it was assembled correctly. I made sure as did my husband. Another issue I had was that when the side zippered down, it was so long that it laid on the bed, and since it wasn't long enough to tuck between the two beds, it was a little difficult to sleep closely. It was a nice product overall, but it just didn't work for my family.
customer_reviews.author: kcicero22

customer_reviews.title: SUFFOCATION RISK
customer_reviews.text: Huge design flaw has a section of the bassinet that IS NOT mesh and acts just like a padded bumper. Bumpers are NOT safe. I had no idea this was even there until my daughter face was pressed up against it. Why they would design a bassinet with a padded, solid wall is beyond me. Not to mention it’s completely wonky and not sturdy whatsoever. It wobbles and is NOT level. I have to keep one side on a higher level setting for it to be somewhat level.
customer_reviews.author: Small Muscles

customer_reviews.title: Very dysfunctional design
customer_reviews.text: What a silly design! The legs are retractable (for platform bed which is our case), but they don’t lock! So even with the secure belt it keeps pushing away from the bed. Then there is a little wheel on the retractable leg, which is good for nothing. Also the bassinet doesn’t go very high at all, so it’s not meant to sit on top of your mattress which completely defeats the purpose of having a bassinet. Seriously, who designed this thing?!?!?!?!
customer_reviews.author: DBGirl

customer_reviews.title: I do not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Cute, modern bassinet/bedside sleeper. My complaint with this product though is its very wobbly ... even on the lowest setting. Also, it is well below my beds mattress level (our bed is not abnormally high, its a plantform bed and doesnt even have a box spring plus its a firm ( not pillow top ) mattress, so i cant see how this would even possibly come close to reaching the height of an average bed with a box spring.. also the mattress included is like a piece of cardboard. extremely hard ( absolutely NO give at all) and very thin and cheap .. overall i am very disappointed in this product ..
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Super wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it. It’s very handy for short moms who had a cesarean! With my first I always had to get my husband to get the baby out of the crib for the first 2 weeks while I was healing because getting on my top toes and leaning over the crib was painful! However this one is great with the side that comes down. The biggest con is how EXTREMELY wobbly it is! Doesn’t seem very sturdy at all. Idk if ours is defective or what, but we followed the instructions to a T when putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for low beds
customer_reviews.text: It’s just what we needed for our low platform bed. All other cosleepers are too high. Did not come with instructions on how to put together and the pictures on the box weren’t exactly helpful but it wasn’t super difficult. Just had to try a few flips of pieces before it came together. Much larger than expected too which is not a complaint. I’m excited for baby to come so we can use it! Wish it came with sheets/cover. It’s too big to use the ones we got and I’m not sure where to find ones large enough for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this for your newborn
customer_reviews.text: So far, I'm loving this bassinet. My baby is only 1 week old, so we did not strap the bassinet to the bed yet. I really like the fact that I can pat the baby back to sleep from my bed when she is a little fussy. I think this bassinet is also good for baby's development as she can sense me (short range sight and breastmilk smell) from her bassinet to where I am.
customer_reviews.author: falling_star

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with tthis bed
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with tthis bed!! I’m close to my baby at night ,with out being afraid of rolling over on him well he sleeps next to me! I also can easily pick him up if he cry’s and feed him! So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It's ok so far
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that the straps have to go under the mattress- that was difficult for us since we don't have a box spring. The bassinet is made very well and does keep my baby close to me. It is very wobbly when moved from side to side. My daughter was in our bed but it became very uncomfortable quickly. So at 15 weeks I decided to get this and it was worth the money- a little over priced but not horrible ($199.99). She was sleeping through the night with us but has woken up at 5am for past few nights, nurses, and goes right back to sleep. Overall, I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Maizy86Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Way to short!
customer_reviews.text: I have a standard sleep number bed, the Bassinet doesn’t reach my Bed at the highest setting. Very frustrating considering i had a c section, can’t bend down to pick baby up lower then me and makes hard for breastfeeding. Would have been a perfect product if it went higher other Then a bed that is just with a box spring on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Clarence W.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bassinet for Baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! My newborn would not sleep flat on her back until we introduced this style bassinet. Prior she had been sleeping in the not-recommended rock n’ play so this item made me very happy. Along with a sleep sack she is sleeping up to 5 hours per night, after feeding she goes right back down until morning (she is now 1 month). The almost 360 mesh and bedside option (one side zips down for access at mattress level) helps for me to check on her easily and hear her should any concerns arise. Definitely recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: T. morgan

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for others just not for us
customer_reviews.text: We returned. My daughter wasn’t a fan, it’s quite large so she had a lot of room on the inside and she likes to sleep somewhat cushioned.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, stylish, but not practical
customer_reviews.text: I love style, colors, and how deep the bassinet is. This allows for a extended use while co sleeping. However, I ordered this one because of how it slides up to the bed for easy reach at night. However, it is quite difficult to drop the side panel especially from a perched position. Therefore, it’s not really practical, I end up just reaching in and do use the feature.
customer_reviews.author: Cjohnson0757

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Only thing make sure to check the measurements cause it’s a bit shorter than our bed (which is taller than a standard one). We’ll have to put books or something underneath to elevate it. But overall we’re satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ilango/Martina

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this bassinet after suffering a birth injury that put me in bedrest for a month with my newborn. I needed to be able to reach him. My bed is a normal bed with a standard box coding and standard mattress. This bassinet did not come close to high enough for me to roll it over the bed. Even at its highest setting it isn’t high enough to perform as advertised. Also, it is not level. It pitch’s at an angle so that my baby literally rolls to the bottom of it. Super dangerous and I’ll be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime W.

customer_reviews.title: It's a Win-Win!
customer_reviews.text: Really glad we decided on this bassinet for our newborn. Assembly was quick and easy, no tools required. Everything feels very sturdy and high quality. The height adjuster knobs on the side are a really nice feature. And I LOVE how it pulls up right next to the bed so baby can be conveniently close for feedings but also have her own safe space. Also, when baby grows out of it, the whole assembly folds down flat for storage. Glad we got it for our first baby so we can use it for the rest of them!
customer_reviews.author: Michael and Lainey Finney

customer_reviews.title: Mattress is too hard
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is too hard. I had to add an extra mattress because was not sleeping well before.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Nucci

customer_reviews.title: High quality!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! My only complaint or slight disappointment is that it doesn't raise higher. I have a normal sized bed and it doesn't reach high enough to be able to slide over top, which is one of the main reasons I wanted it. But it was bigger than anticipated which makes me happy, baby will fit in it for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Great bedside bassinette
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sisters baby shower gift and she loves it! The set up is super easy. It’s very sleek and looks great. Her only complaint was to have more pocket space the only pocket is on the very end where she can’t reach easily from her bed. She can transfer this from living room to bedroom very easily and baby sleeps great. It seems very sturdy but has a slight wiggle which we think is intentional to rock baby back to sleep. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Not sturdy. Will do if you use straps but can probably do better if you search.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but after setting up I have to say it feels cheap. It’s definitely not something I’d describe as sturdy - If I’d designed this, I would have added a brace for the legs... there’s just too much side to side movement. The sleeping pad is very thin. I’ll have to order one or maybe wrap a few sheets around it. I’m not asking for a very soft pillow top mattress feel... but this feels like an MDF board covered in a thin sheet of foam. I think you’ll definitely want to use the straps provided to tie it down to your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ehhh

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent product  for the price
customer_reviews.text: We had rented the Snoo and our baby didn’t like it so we were looking for another bassinet that would come up to the bed. I like the zip down side feature to make it easier to get to the baby. I do not like the height limitations, as this comes nowhere close to the top of my bed. I also wish it had legs that we’re not quite as tall because the legs do not fit under my bedframe. Overall decent value for the price. It is not very sturdy though. It does shake very easily. This makes it nice and someways to rock the baby, but generally I don’t feel like it should be wobbly like it is.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Needed force to put together
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't easy to assemble. The parts were hard to put together. It needed a lot of force! The bassinet looks practical but wait those little plastic parts need a lot of improvement. Not sure if its travel friendly like the claim.
customer_reviews.author: Lightening

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t maneuver around your house
customer_reviews.text: So I’m pretty disappointed in this bassinet. It looks wonderful but isn’t what it’s made out to be. This thing maneuvers long ways. None of my door ways are large enough to accommodate it(I have standard doors) so basically I have to carry it to other rooms, it’s a little heavy. It looks like it’s expensive and gets almost level with my bed. But the fact that it says you can wheel it around the house is 100% false.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Super disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this, but it’s a good two feet shorter than our bed. There’s no way I can sit up to feed baby and then place him way down into the bassinet. The pull down side has zero use since the bed is still taller. Maybe I could use it if I didn’t just have a baby and I had abs of steel...but no. Giant waste of money.. no way we could get this back into the box to return. Sigh. We have a standard bed and mattress..
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Landau

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: We've now used this bedside bassinet for 1 week with our newborn, and we are very pleased. The product arrived promptly, it was easy to assemble and it's light weight. I like that it gets plenty of air flow to the baby with the breathable walls. I do wish that the height adjustments went a little higher. We have a fairly tall bed, but it seems to me this product is made for beds that are quite low to the ground. Other than that we are completely pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Gragg

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. My newborn sleeps well in it and I like the option to zip it down to put next to my bed. Easy access to newborn especially since she wakes up to eat every hour of the night. I also zip it up when my one year old is crawling near it. Only thing I would change is the wheels... I feel like it could maneuver better when moving it out the way to go to the bathroom since my room is small.
customer_reviews.author: shannel

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but bulky & hard to move.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it could go higher, for those of us with tall beds - it doesn’t sit flush like I hoped it would. I wanted my baby girl easier to reach after a complicated cesarean delivery and limited mobility.
customer_reviews.author: Sean & Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Im having my baby May 10 and I hope my baby will like the bassinet. It was really easy to put it together you do not need tools. What I dislike is the it doesn’t go as high as my bed, but I think it will work, the bassinet is pretty big not like the other bassinet that seem to small, also you can fold it back up and store it, when your baby is done using and you upgraded with a crib.
customer_reviews.author: Ulloa

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, timely delivery, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time and looks as described. The set up was an absolute breeze! Baby arrives in under a month, and we have anchored this to the bed. It looks great. I was a little worried about how wobbly it felt for a bit, but when anchored, it’s really secure. I’m looking forward to making the most of it when baby arrives.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Expecting a little man come November, so planning ahead. My son had one that was pretty low to the ground, we almost never used it. But this just about matches the height of the bed. My 4 yr old got inside and curled up and it didn’t break down. It had a little lateral movement, but nothing to be concerned about for a new born who won’t be active for a while. Oh I don’t think it comes with a mattress. And watch the official YouTube video makes assembly quick
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Gave 5 stars for the questions that were asked but I am not a huge fan of the side where it folds down to connect to the bed. It’s really hard and my son likes to sleep up against that part and he bangs his little head into it. I wish it was mesh like the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Magan M.

customer_reviews.title: Very unstable
customer_reviews.text: This product is not stable. It rocks side to side very easily. It just does not sit sturdy on its legs. Even attached to the bed and pulled snug, the unit still easily moves side to side. I have never assembled anything for a baby that feels as shakey as this. The height measurements weren't easily spotted in on the main page, so watch out your bed isnt too high. The mattress is also a tad hard. Will return, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tony LePage

customer_reviews.title: Life saving bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I found this bassinet on amazon and glad I bought it!! I was initially considering Halo Bassinest or My Arm’s Reach bassinet but they were too high for my bed height and wouldn’t work the way I was hoping. The height of this bassinet is just perfect and so very easy to take my baby out and back for night time feedings and diaper change. A big life saver for moms recovering from csection!! The only cons is that the mattress is not stain proof. We’ve got some stains already from baby’s spit ups...but other than that it’s a great product!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time buying because you will be returning it.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the worst bassinets we’ve ever had. It is extremely flimsy and the mattress is more of a board than a soft place to sleep. We are returning it. Don’t waste your time buying. My friend bought the same one and she has the same thoughts about it.
customer_reviews.author: jjrmusic

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is super hard and it doesn't raise high enough to attach to our bed which is annoying. Also, I wish it had pockets or something for storage. Overall I would say it's just ok for the price but I wish I went with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: For $200+, you'll expect to get a solid basinet, this feels cheap and flimsy. Also the matress that came with it is paper thing...for a new born
customer_reviews.author: Olumide A.

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for 6 weeks now and just love it. Our little one sleeps soundly, it's easy to take him out for night feedings, fits perfectly against our bed, and was super simple to put together. It even holds my 3.5-year-old when she wants to 'sleep where brother sleeps'. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Does not get high enough.
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap. It was wobly and I would probably end up breaking it. It is hard to move around especially on carpet. The wheels are tiny and only two of them. It does not get high enough next to our bed and I believe our bed is standard height. For all the good reviews I thought it would be good but it's definitely not the one for us.
customer_reviews.author: yolo

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases we made. Baby feels safe knowing mom and dad are sleeping right next to him, and we feel happy we can see him at all times and have easy access from the bed. We had a crib at first and he kept crying when we placed him in it. Once we bought this, he took to it immediately. It is sturdy, cozy, yet, feels spacious and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: piyokii

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, but not super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product is very light weight which is great! We’re planning to move it around the house as needed. We bought this because of all the great reviews. Only downside is that it isn’t as sturdy as we would have liked. We don’t anticipate issues, but it can sway a little bit more than we’re comfortable with.
customer_reviews.author: Hollyfield's

customer_reviews.title: Simply great!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bassinet. My baby feels comfortable because I’m close by yet she’s safe in her own space. I love the zip down wall feature which makes it easy to reach in to comfort the baby. I was concerned about my cat being able to tip it over but it has an anchor strap that attaches to your bed.
customer_reviews.author: MorgansMom7348

customer_reviews.title: Way too low for our bed
customer_reviews.text: This basinet is too low for our bed. Even the highest level is several inches too low. The wheels are a little shabby and it doesn't feel sturdy. We'll see how it works but overall I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Am. Custom.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our new granddaughter and mom and dad say she loves it. They love having her so close and yet safely tucked in the bassinet within arms reach. It delivered fast!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I love that it unzips on the side so I can lay right up next to it in my bed and slide him in when he falls asleep or put his pacifier back in easily without having to sit up a million times. Definitely recommend for use immediately after birth to transition into crib.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly & Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something for the baby to sleep in our room (but not in our bed), that was affordable and looked good. We stumbled upon this bassinet and bedside sleeper and are very happy with our purchase. It took less than 5 min to out together (there's a very helpful assembly video on the product listing). My wife loves the look of it too. Will definitely be looking into purchasing other pieces of this collection.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: I’m am loving this bassinet as it fits perfectly next to my bedside! Not only was this product easy to assemble, but also very sturdy. It is so convenient having the baby so close for late night feedings! This bassinet provides easy access to the baby on the side panel. In addition, it was so nice to have the cover and sheet included! Such a plus!! Overall great product and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kelleher

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: The product came damaged one of the pieces would not lock properly. Moreover, assembly was a nightmare as the manual hardly provided adequate instructions, and the product felt cheaply made. Everything was plastic and did not feel very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Nice and roomy. I wish it was a little longer, the legs weren’t so wobbly and it went taller but all in all it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Newborn bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Great bassinet. I have a lower bed frame and this bassinet works perfectly. Very happy with this purchase. Great visibility through the mesh so I can glance over at my newborn with every noise. I love that the side stays down so that after she is done feeding I can easily put her back in to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, a little akward to move around, best for two ppl if moving from on place to another. Can't waiter for the little one to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: R. H.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bedside sleeper!
customer_reviews.text: This sleeper is a lifesaver! My two month old has been sleeping in this since he was 2 weeks old. I tried to get him to sleep in the rock n play and he hated it. I love that you can put one side up higher than the other so it is at a slight incline. This is so helpful for babies who suffer from reflux.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this bassinet. My baby loved it. Easy to access and fits great if your bed is not too high or has a tall bed frame. It is right size doesn't take up too much space. Great color. I couldn't wait to buy it. If you do not want to buy a crib due to limited space this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Magana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's easy to get my son for midnight feedings. It does say onthe box up to 5 months which I didn't see in the description. I hope to use until he can roll over.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Measure the height of our bed and get another mattress to replace the one it comes with.
customer_reviews.text: bought this because I wanted my baby to be close by and have a safe space. This was easy to put together but this doesn’t go that high and I had to bend down over my bed to get him. We have a king bed with a normal height. Plus the mattress is extremely hard so we used this for 1-2 nights that’s it. Now it’s just a storage place for us since we can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chhina

customer_reviews.title: Love this cosleeper!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cosleeper my son hated his bassinet and wouldn't sleep on his pack n play. We bought this product and ever since he has slept through the night. If you have a baby that doesn't like not being able to see you or out around then this is the perfect solution. It is also great for mom's as well easy access to the baby in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this. There are cheaper options for a bassinet that are better. This bassinets is not sturdy AT ALL. Its also very low to the ground. just not a good option and there is no music or mobile with this bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I made for baby!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product, I highly recommend this bassinet! Easy reach to get to your child for nighttime feedings and cuddles. Is a bit wobbly if you don’t use the straps so I recommend using them to secure it to the bed. This is roomy and the firm mattress helps to keep your baby safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Awesome solution!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet. We tried another but my didn’t like that I had to get all the way out of bed to pick up my baby. This bedside one is great! I can sleep knowing he isn’t in my bed but is close enough that I don’t have to worry about missing anything. Would highly recommend for anyone with a baby who only seems to sleep if it’s in bed with a parent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We truly love this bassinet. Our baby has slept in it since he got out of the hospital. I enjoy that bassinet has height change but i wish I could go taller. I also love the fact that you can check on your child by lowering the screen.
customer_reviews.author: mmct

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver!!!! Only thing that concerns me is that the legs can feel somewhat flimsy when you try to move it\ slide (not as sturdy as a wood frame) but it’s nothing too crazy! It is adjustable to bed heigh I do wish it would go higher since our bed is a bit taller than most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was very straightforward and it has been working great for us. It’s also bigger than I expected it would be so hopefully we can use it for several months. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: alannajoy10

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed for the price. It isn’t much flexible and not very sturdy. Not ideal for platform bed either. For $200, it’s NOT worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashraf M.

customer_reviews.title: Height
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product and beautiful, too bad it doesn't go up more, my bed is higher so I have to bend a little more to lay down my baby in this crib since it is not at the same level with me.
customer_reviews.author: andrea alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, bed is extremely hard for newborn needs a padded mat. And it not stable
customer_reviews.author: Tae greene

customer_reviews.title: Dont base it off good ratings.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at bassinets that were rated pretty high so I knew I was getting what I paid for, plus I wanted it to be safe for my baby! We recieved this broken.. the spring was out and its unfixable. Now with that being said, it served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: William Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good in theory
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome and easy to assemble (it’s literally 2 steps!). Problem is that it’s clunky, rickety, doesn’t work with even slightly tall beds and baby hates it. Mattress is super thin and hard.
customer_reviews.author: Cristal Logothetis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we didn’t receive ours because of mishandled delivery and had to buy it from target but it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. This is so perfect, especially if you had a c section and it’s difficult to get up and walk to the crib, you can have your baby right next to you.
customer_reviews.author: maddie

customer_reviews.title: Not for platform beds
customer_reviews.text: The description doesn’t adequately advise you that this is really only compatible with beds that have box springs - if you have a platform bed it won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet. The legs are a little flimsy but not loose, maybe because I have it on carpet. But only notice it when I move it around. They just seem to spread a little further apart. But they are not lose, trust me! And it’s bigger than I thought. My newborn looks tiny in there.
customer_reviews.author: Yellmi Gomez

customer_reviews.title: very well built
customer_reviews.text: so i have not assembled this yet because my baby is not due til (10-22-19) but i did take it out the box and check it out. i love how sturdy and well built is seems to be, i wish it came with a mattress for the price. And in the product description i did not see where it said if it came with one or not. Over all its a nice set up and my girlfriend and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: BlakknPakkn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for low beds
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is the perfect addition for our infant. It connects easily to the bed and has several different height positions to help line it up perfectly with the bed height. It makes breastfeeding easy at night and allows you to get extra sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroshi

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, but needs to be a little taller
customer_reviews.text: If you have a tall bed, this will not work well as it will be too low
customer_reviews.author: just Will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newborn!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with it! 2 things would make it perfect. 1. Wheels on front as well as back and 2. To swing on it's own. My newborn loves it, I love it. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: Baby bed, saver
customer_reviews.text: Oh man was this a life saver for us when we just had our baby girl. I love that you can literally just reach over from your bed. My baby loved it she would sleep all night in this bed!
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Gutsu

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is a great size for a baby to grow in at least till they are for or five months old. It’s wide and easy to assemble. My son isn’t born yet do not sure on the comfort from him or how flexible getting him in and out of this will be
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Safety is an issue
customer_reviews.text: The high of this bassinet is too short to fit any standard bed. It looks unsafe to use it as bedside, because anything can slide from the mother bed such as pillows and fall on baby. Scary product.
customer_reviews.author: amsalu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Best bedside bassinet you can get super sturdy and comfortable for my baby she’s been using it for 6 months. It’s easy to clean. I would recommend buying a soft mattress or a docatot or any other baby lounger for cheap to add in the bassinet so that it’s not so hard to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Easy for mom and baby
customer_reviews.text: Baby sleeps well in this bassinet and I can easily reach her to pick her up at night and feed her. It's also nice to be able to reach her to soothe her without having to get up.
customer_reviews.author: Kellee

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet for feeding from bed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bassinet first those who need baby close but do not want them in their own bed. It’s a great height for looking in on baby from your bed and placing them back in. My daughter liked this so much I bought another one for my best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift and accessory for my new grand baby. My daughter loves and it the baby is very comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erock (Erick)

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this bassinet oppose to a different one I purchased for my first grandchild. She feels it is more safe for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Tzonni

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Is not high enough at all. I wanted something that would be level with my mattress so I could scoop my daughter out and feed her but this is way below it even at the highest level.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with it. 1. It doesn’t go as high as my bed. 2. The side clips to attach and detach the side of it are super pointy and dangerous. 3. The barrier between the bed and the crib is super high. 4. The mattress is so hard and it’s a weird shape so it’s impossible to find another mattress that fits well. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Luckynumber7

customer_reviews.title: Just OK. Shakes when newborn moves
customer_reviews.text: Newborn breathing makes this bassinet shake. It’s not very stable so when my newborn 2 week old weighting 8lbs moves the bassinet shakes. It’s nice looking but not sturdy. It’s big and bulky and Hard to move around so the portability is not really there. Also this could be my floor or the bassinet but it’s not same level on either side. Mattress pad is hard
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Ann

customer_reviews.title: A great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: We gifted this to our son and daughter-in-law. They love it! In the first few months baby could be next to them. The ability to easily lower the side makes it easy to lift baby in and out. It easily rolls to another room. Easy to put up or take down.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Cohrs

customer_reviews.title: Good item, incredibly slow return!
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because it was too low for our bed.m but it was easy to assemble and seemed sturdy enough. The reason for the 2 stars is because it has taken forever to get a refund for the item even though I returned it a month ago! I had to order another one and I don’t think I should be out of pocket for this long.
customer_reviews.author: Naty Ferro

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and adjust! Makes a great surface to set things on when baby insists on touching his mom while sleeping. Maybe he’ll sleep in it someday.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna V.

customer_reviews.title: All moms should have one!
customer_reviews.text: Best bassinet I could have bought for my daughter and her new born son. It’s comfortable and safe which helps my daughter sleep better at night as well as my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Casey

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS! Better than all the other bassinets I tried!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our second baby and the only thing I wish is that I woudl have had it for our first! It is so convenient, nice to look at, and was very easy to assemble. Woudl recommend it over several others that I tried by far!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Pater

customer_reviews.title: Great For So Many Reasons
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my daughter in law wanted. Easy to move baby into bed to nurse her!
customer_reviews.author: jerrilyn hamley

product_meta.title: Baby Delight Beside Me Dreamer Bassinet & Bedside Sleeper
product_meta.description:
Style:Charcoal TweedSleep soundly knowing that your baby is safer and comfortable in the Beside Me Dreamer Bassinet & Bedside Sleeper. In the Bassinet mode, your little one is surrounded by breathable mesh walls that keep air circulating while providing her with her own private sleeping area. It is lightweight enough to move from room to room for convenience. For Bedside Sleeper mode, simply unzip the side panel closest to your bed and snug the Beside Me Dreamer right up to the side. The attached straps safely secure the Bedside Sleeper to your adult bed, ensuring it stays snug and in place. Easily lean over to nurse, comfort or just check on your baby during the night, knowing she is right there beside you. For added comfort, the 6-position height adjustment can be used to adapt the sleeper height to most adult beds.
For use up to 20 lbs or 5 months.
feature_bullets: SAFE and COMFORT- Sleep soundly knowing that your baby is safer and comfortable
MOBILE- It is lightweight enough to move from room to room for convenience.
ADJUSTABLE- 6-positions allow height adjustment to adapt the sleeper height to most adult beds.
ACCESS- Easily lean over to nurse, comfort or just check on your baby during the night

specifications.Additional product features: Bassinet or Bedside Sleeper, Breathable mesh side walls
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,284 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
